data.name: Jesters Poker
data.detailed_description:
Jester's Poker, play Texas Holdem poker and discover Circus Jester in this new adventure.

Experience Single player Poker in a new way, there are challenges, tournaments and survival games all bringing a unique experience. The jester experience.

Play poker to discover and help everybody in the circus. Tree's have been cut down, Balthasars rabbit is stolen and stranger things are happening. Will you be able to solve the mystery?

Features
  • Take control of your story
  • Engage in fast-paced challenges
  • Unleash your poker-game to unlock challenges
  • Discover the circus world by world
  • Solve riddles and help everyone at jesters circus
  • Enjoy graphics, music and code thats made with passion

Have fun playing this card game Texas Holdem Poker style

data.short_description: The best single player Poker adventure out now!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Dutch
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Jesters Poker is a unique story-driven take on Texas Hold’em poker that features fun characters, vibrant visuals and accessible yet deep gameplay.”
great – ifanzine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GB RAM
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.8/10.9/10.10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
